question: Who has been appointed as the new chairman of the Press Trust of India?
explanation:
India’s premier news agency, the Press Trust of India has elected the Vice Chairman of Ananda Bazar Group of Publications (ABP), Aveek Sarkar as the next Chairman.
Aveek Sarkar is to succeed Vijay Kumar Chopra, Chief Editor of the Punjab Kesari Group. He was also the editor of the Bengali language daily ‘Anandabazar Patrika’ and English daily ‘The Telegraph’. He was the founding MD of Penguin India and the founding Editor of Business Standard.
